about_the_game:
Night Plane is a thrilling airborne hospitality simulator that costs way less than a plane ticket! Board passengers, assist with their trivial struggles, and resolve emergency situations all by yourself in this hyper-realistic representation of a commercial flight in 1999 New Zealand. Enjoy the world-class airport, babies crying at 30,000 feet, and very reliable aircraft systems. Also, please don't let the psychopomp fly the aircraft.

  • Board passengers, keep them comfortable, and strive to provide a survivable flight for all paying customers.

  • Decide who boards the plane! Customer satisfaction is what it's all about, but some passengers just aren't worth the hassle. If someone looks like a troublemaker, feel free to reject them at boarding and luxuriate in their absence during the flight.

  • Countless (99+) interactable objects, both in the airport and on the plane!

  • Hyper-realist representation of 1999 New Zealand.

  • Unravel the occult mysteries of the airplane bathroom...

  • And pet the cat!

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of Plane Crash, General Mature Language

name: Night Plane

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 1 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 850 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Night Plane is a thrilling airborne hospitality simulator that costs way less than a plane ticket! It's your first night on the job: Board passengers, assist with their struggles, and resolve emergencies all by yourself. Also, please don't let the psychopomp fly the aircraft.
